=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: Buy Bajaj Finance; target of Rs 9000: Emkay Global Financial
Source: Moneycontrol - News
Published: 2024-04-23 08:06
Related Stocks: BAJFINANCE, RELIANCE
Categories: general

Summary:
Emkay Global Financial is bullish on Bajaj Finance has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 9000 in its research report dated April 23, 2024.

Sentiment: positive
URL: https://www.moneycontrol.com/news/recommendations/buy-bajaj-finance-targetrs-9000-emkay-global-financial_17531631.html
